hero.title: We are Team Graceful Ageing
hero.description: We are on a mission to make Graceful Ageing a reality for everyone. We would like to help us start this journey. Select from a variety of themes we have curated. Click any card to preview the theme and subthemes, you can choose multiple options, and continue to the survey.

card.alt: Healthy lifestyle â€“ fruits and active living
card.description: A lifestyle of healthy habits that sustain energy, joy, and long life.

subthemes: Movement as Medicine: gardening, cleaning, daily chores, gentle fitness
Food and Nourishment: plant-based eating, 80% full, anti-inflammatory foods
Alcohol/Softdrinks: nuanced discussion of moderation and wellbeing
Downshifting: slowing down, simplifying life, reducing stress

card.description: Emotional, psychological, and spiritual shifts that shape us through life.

subthemes: Hormonal Changes and Menopause: pre/meno/post menopause, physical/mental changes
Loss & Rediscovery of Identity: self-esteem, purpose, acceptance, empty nesters
Personal Boundaries & Limits: managing influence, setting limits, saying yes/no
Soul, Purpose & Longing: meaning-making, inner beauty, desires without boundaries
Desires in life: what excites you, what keeps you awake at night

card.alt: Family walking together outdoors, symbolizing safety and belonging
card.description: The changing role of relationships and community throughout life.

subthemes: Family & Friends: friends as family, extended family, kids, partner
Tribe & Community: social circle, right tribe, belonging
Sisterhood: shared experience, emotional support, women supporting women
Changes in Relationships: changes with self, friends, partner, work
Loneliness & Connection: Internally, externally

card.alt: Tree growing strong in a harsh environment, symbolizing resilience
card.description: Practical skills to navigate daily life with intention and confidence.

subthemes: Financial Health: planning, independence, navigating changes
Work & Purpose: meaning of work, shifting values, staying engaged
Managing Daily Life: routines, wellbeing now and in the future
Managing Change, Embracing Limits: adapting to change, mindset

card.alt: Family walking together outdoors, symbolizing safety and belonging
card.description: Creating safety that nurtures trust, freedom, and peace of mind.

subthemes: Emotional Safety & Vulnerability (especially for topics like illness, menopause, end-of-life)
Physical Safety: walking alone outside/in darkness, daily chores in society (bank/post/shopping), self defence, unexpected visitors
IT Security: frauds, whom and what to trust, spam, knowledge

card.description: Creating peace of mind through intentional choices for the future.

subthemes: End-of-Life Desires: funeral wishes, music, setting, atmosphere
Footprints & Legacy: how you want to be remembered
Care & Contingency Plans: illness, accidents, caregiving preferences
Legal & Ethical Considerations: will, organ donation, body disposition
